title: New: Henry Jamison – Dallas Love Field
content:
Henry Jamison has quickly become one of my favourite new artists of the year.

Having already clocked up well in excess of a million plays on Spotify alone, it’s clear that his wholesome songwriting is striking a chord with more than just me. His third offering, Dallas Love Field, has more than a touch of Conor Oberst to it – and that’s meant entirely as a compliment. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
